greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Mobius transform of A014963.
comment: Conjectures relating to the Mobius sequence A008683:
If mu(n) = 1, (n>1), a(n) = a negative term.
If mu(n) = -1, a(n) = a positive term.
So except for the first term and zero divided by zero we would have mu(n) = -a(n)/abs(a(n)).
formula: A054525 as an infinite lower triangular matrix * A014963 as a vector.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_ and _Mats Granvik_, May 16 2008, Jun 29 2008
